body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack clean -a
$ spack install gmp %gcc@9.2.0

==> 2477: Installing gmp
==> Finding buildcaches in /ccs/opt/vendors/spack.mirror/build_cache
==> Fetching file:///ccs/opt/vendors/spack.mirror/build_cache/linux-rhel7-sandybridge-gcc-9.2.0-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t.spec.yaml
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /ccs/opt/vendors/spack.mirror/build_cache/linux-rhel7-sandybridge-gcc-9.2.0-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t.spec.yaml
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: file:///ccs/opt/vendors/spack.mirror/build_cache/linux-rhel7-sandybridge-gcc-9.2.0-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t.spec.yaml
    Curl failed with error 37
==> Fetching from file:///ccs/opt/vendors/spack.mirror/build_cache/linux-rhel7-sandybridge-gcc-9.2.0-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t.spec.yaml failed.
==> Using cached archive: /ccs/opt/vendors/spack.develop/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/52/5275bb04f4863a13516b2f39392ac5e272f5e1bb8057b18aec1c9b79d73d8fb2.tar.bz2
==> Staging archive: /tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t/gmp-6.1.2.tar.bz2
==> Created stage in /tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-gmp-6.1.2-j4rkamfvvdjpmee3cc3f6viqrgefav3t
==> No patches needed for gmp
==> 2477: gmp: Building gmp [AutotoolsPackage]
==> 2477: gmp: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> 2477: gmp: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> 2477: gmp: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

17 errors found in build log:
     627    /bin/sh ../libtool --mode=compile --tag=CC ../mpn/m4-ccas --m4="m4"
             /ccs/opt/vendors/spack.develop/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -c -DHAVE_CON
            FIG_H -I. -I..  -D__GMP_WITHIN_GMP -I.. -DOPERATION_`echo mul_1 | s
            ed 's/_$//'`   -O2 -pedantic -fomit-frame-pointer -m64 -mtune=k8 -m
            arch=k8 -Wa,--noexecstack `test -f 'mul_1.asm' || echo './'`mul_1.a
            sm
     628    /bin/sh ../libtool --mode=compile --tag=CC ../mpn/m4-ccas --m4="m4"
             /ccs/opt/vendors/spack.develop/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -c -DHAVE_CON
            FIG_H -I. -I..  -D__GMP_WITHIN_GMP -I.. -DOPERATION_`echo addmul_1 
            | sed 's/_$//'`   -O2 -pedantic -fomit-frame-pointer -m64 -mtune=k8
             -march=k8 -Wa,--noexecstack `test -f 'addmul_1.asm' || echo './'`a
            ddmul_1.asm
     629    libtool: Version mismatch error.  This is libtool 2.4.6, but the
     630    libtool: definition of this LT_INIT comes from libtool 2.4.2.
     631    libtool: You should recreate aclocal.m4 with macros from libtool 2.
            4.6
     632    libtool: and run autoconf again.
  >> 633    make[2]: *** [fib_table.lo] Error 63
     634    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

### Information on your system

```console
 %  spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-774-63ff121
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-sandybridge
```

### Additional information

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4518949/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4518951/spack-build-out.txt)

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: gmp
